Name.label: Malformation syndrome with odontal and/or periodontal component
Partial deletion of the long arm of chromosome 11
Genetic malformation syndrome with odontal and/or periodontal component

TextSection.Contents: A contiguous gene syndrome comprising otodental syndrome (characterized by globodontia and sensorineural high-frequency hearing deficit) associated with eye abnormalities including, typically, iris and chorioretinal coloboma, as well as, on occasion, microcornea, microphtalmos, lenticular opacity, lens coloboma and iris pigment epithelial atrophy.

Name.label: NTBT (narrower term maps to a broader term)
